title: Welcome to the Blog
content: This is the first post of the blog. Expect regular updates on all things engineering, modeling, and computing.

title: Model-Based Systems Engineering
content: Model-Based Systems Engineering (MBSE) is a formalized approach to system design using models and simulation.

title: LaTeX in Blog Posts
content: You can include equations like \( E = mc^2 \) using LaTeX syntax in your posts.

title: Control Systems Overview
content: Feedback loops, transfer functions, and Bode plots are all part of the control systems world.
